ui::EventLoopAttr Class Reference

Documentation

This class defines attributes that apply to an ui::EventLoop.

Member Function Documentation

u16 ui::EventLoopAttr::hibernate_timeout ( ) const
inline

This method returns the hibernate timeout in milliseconds

bool ui::EventLoopAttr::is_hibernate ( ) const
inline

This method returns true if hibernate is enabled (hibernate timeout is non-zero)

u16 ui::EventLoopAttr::period ( ) const
inline

This method returns the period for the loop

inline

This method sets the hibernate timeout in milliseconds

void ui::EventLoopAttr::set_period ( u16  v)
inline

This method sets the Event loop period.

Parameters
vThe loop period in milliseconds.
void ui::EventLoopAttr::set_update_period ( u16  v)
inline

This method set the Event::UPDATE period which defines how often the event loop will trigger the Event::UPDATE command for the current element.

Parameters
vThe period in milliseconds
u16 ui::EventLoopAttr::update_period ( ) const
inline

This method returns the period for firing the Event::UPDATE
